Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Stickmasterluke -- A nice simple axe
function WaitForChild(obj, name) while not obj:FindFirstChild(name) do wait() print("1waiting for " .. name) end return obj:FindFirstChild(name) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Damage = 25
local Sword = Tool.Handle local Hitbox = Sword:FindFirstChild("stickbox")
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = Sword SlashSound.Volume = .7
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Sword UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
local EquipTime = time()
function AttachAxe(hit) local taxe = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Handle") local axeFrame = taxe.CFrame taxe.Parent = hit local tweld = Instance.new("Weld") tweld.Part0 = hit tweld.Part1 = taxe tweld.C0 = CFrame.new() tweld.C1 = axeFrame:inverse() * hit.CFrame tweld.Parent = hit
local stickscript = taxe:FindFirstChild("waitBin"):FindFirstChild("stickScript"):Clone() stickscript.Parent = taxe stickscript.Disabled = false Sword:FindFirstChild("axehit"):Play() end
local BlowMade = false function Blow(hit) if (hit.Parent == nil) or time() - EquipTime<2 then return end -- happens when bullet hits Sword local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non - nil if Tool held by a character
if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure Sword is in - hand local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == Sword or joint.Part1 == Sword)) and not BlowMade then BlowMade = true AttachAxe(hit)
script.Parent.Parent = Sword TagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) wait(1) UnTagHumanoid(humanoid) BlowMade = false end end end end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UnTagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function DoSuperStrike() local bvelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bvelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(9999999, 99999999, 99999999) local dir = (script.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").TargetPoint - Sword.CFrame.p).unit bvelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(dir.x * 75, dir.y * 75, dir.z * 75) Tool.Parent = game.Workspace bvelocity.Parent = Sword wait(2) bvelocity:Destroy() end
Tool.Enabled = true function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled and time() - EquipTime>2 then Tool.Enabled = false local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = WaitForChild(character, "Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end SlashSound:play() if time() - script.Parent:FindFirstChild("lastSuperStrike").Value<2 then DoSuperStrike() else Tool.doStrike.Value = not Tool.doStrike.Value wait(1) end Tool.Enabled = true end end
function ReAttachStickbox() -- wait(2) local tweld = Instance.new("Weld") Sword:FindFirstChild("stickbox").CFrame = CFrame.new(Sword.CFrame * Vector3.new(0, 1, 0), Sword.CFrame.lookVector) tweld.Part0 = Sword -- > part0 has to be the parent tweld.Part1 = Sword:FindFirstChild("stickbox") tweld.C0 = CFrame.new() tweld.C1 = Sword:FindFirstChild("stickbox").CFrame:inverse() * Sword.CFrame tweld.Parent = Sword end
function OnEquipped() EquipTime = time() UnsheathSound:play() ReAttachStickbox() end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
Hitbox.Touched:connect(Blow)

function waitForChild(obj,name) while not obj:FindFirstChild(name) do wait() print("1waiting for " .. name) end return obj:FindFirstChild(name) end
local TimePlaced = time() local MyPart = script.Parent
local RipOutDamage = 15
while not MyPart:FindFirstChild("HorrorAxe") do -- print("waiting for horror axe") wait() end local DamagePerTick = 2 local MyTool = MyPart:FindFirstChild("HorrorAxe") local MyHost = MyPart.Parent local MyCharacter = MyHost.Parent local MyHumanoid = waitForChild(MyCharacter,"Humanoid") -- WE HAVE TO GO DEEPER local TakingAxe = false
script.Parent:FindFirstChild("screaming"):Play()
function ReAttachStickbox() local tweld = Instance.new("Weld") tweld.Part0 = MyPart -- > part0 has to be the parent tweld.Part1 = MyPart:FindFirstChild("stickbox") tweld.C0 = CFrame.new() tweld.C1 = MyPart:FindFirstChild("stickbox").CFrame:inverse() * MyPart.CFrame tweld.Parent = MyPart end
function OnTouch(hit) if (hit.Parent == nil) then return end -- happens when bullet hits sword local vhumanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) --print("retreveing axe "..vhumanoid.." "..MyHumanoid) if vhumanoid ~= nil and vhumanoid ~= MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid ~= nil and time() - TimePlaced>2 and not TakingAxe then TakingAxe = true print("it's a humanoid") -- temptool.Parent = game.Workspace MyHumanoid:TakeDamage(RipOutDamage) MyTool.Parent = nil MyPart.Parent = MyTool MyTool.Parent = game.Workspace ReAttachStickbox() script.Parent:FindFirstChild("screaming"):Stop() -- vhumanoid:EquipTool(MyTool)
script:Destroy() end end script.Parent.Touched:connect(OnTouch)
while script.Parent do MyHumanoid:TakeDamage(DamagePerTick) wait(.5)
end

--Stickmasterluke --A nice simple axe function waitForChild(obj,name) while not obj:FindFirstChild(name) do wait() print("1waiting for " .. name) end return obj:FindFirstChild(name) end
local sp=script.Parent local sword=waitForChild(sp,"Handle")
enabled=true taunting=false
function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end enabled=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(1.25) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled=true end
function swordUp() sp.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.1, 1, 0, -0, 0, -0, -1, -0, 1, -0) end
function swordOut() sp.Grip=CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.1, 1, 0, -0, 0, -0, -1, -0, 1, -0)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/4,.4,0) end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped if mouse==nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

function WaitForChild(obj, name) while not obj:FindFirstChild(name) do wait() print("1waiting for " .. name) end return obj:FindFirstChild(name) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = WaitForChild(Tool, "Handle") local RunServe = game:service("RunService") -- time last key was pressed local LastWDown = 0 local LastADown = 0 local LastDDown = 0 local LastSuperStrike = 0
function OnKeyDown(key) keytime = RunServe.Stepped:wait() if key:lower() == "w" then LastWDown = keytime elseif key:lower() == "a" then LastADown = keytime elseif key:lower() == "d" then LastDDown = keytime if LastDDown - LastADown <.4 and LastWDown>LastADown then print("SUPER STRIKE") LastSuperStrike = keytime script.Parent:FindFirstChild("lastSuperStrike").Value = LastSuperStrike end end end
function OnEquippedLocal(mouse) mouse.KeyDown:connect(OnKeyDown) end Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquippedLocal)
while not Tool:FindFirstChild("doStrike") do wait() end
print("got here in localscript") Tool.doStrike.Changed:connect(function() local h = WaitForChild(Tool.Parent, "Humanoid") local t = WaitForChild(Tool.Parent, "Torso") local anim = WaitForChild(Tool, "AxeSwing") theanim = h:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and h.Health>0 then theanim:Play() end end)
